TEXT: NL Everyone prepares for a barrage...

While walking through a dark alley, you encounter a group conducting a shadowy ritual, their faces hidden behind masks. As you approach, they turn towards you with unsettling grins. The tallest among them, with elongated fangs protruding, extends a pale hand toward you. NL ~"Join~ ~us,~ ~Solver.~ ~Feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
